title: Calculating Factorial
description:
Build a program from the blocks in the tray that uses the math library, declares a math object, and calls the factorial action. Edit the actions so it finds the factorial of 4 and outputs the following message.

The factorial of 4 is 24
hint: Start by adding the use block for the Math library. Next, add the math object block. Then place the correct action block that calculates the factorial. Once the block is placed replace the word value with 4 so the action can calculate the factorial. Then add the output block, which outputs text and the result of the action you placed into the program. When your program is done run your program and check your answer.
